channel.title: My PEST CONTROL Portals Respawn after getting killed Why?
channel.description: Title says it all, how do i make them not respawn so pest control can actually be playable?

item.title: My PEST CONTROL Portals Respawn after getting killed Why?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

In npchandler.java find:

Replace with: } else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].needRespawn == true && npcs[i].npcType != 6142 && npcs[i].npcType != 6143 && npcs[i].npcType != 6144 && npcs[i].npcType != 6145) {
